pageTitle: The Antique Phonograph Music Program: Playlist for December 16, 2008
textAfterTable: Listener comments!   Mon. 12/29/08 7:46pm Tom Gervat: Thanks for yet another great Christmas show! Especially appreciate the Charles Harrison & Trinity Choir tracks -they don't get much better than that.   Sun. 3/29/09 10:44am Jeremy Passarelli: I have a wind up phonograph. It Is A Victor Vicrola VVX-VI. I cannot play any records on it because it does not have a crank. :) Enable Javascript for more options!
